message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering inflation is on my side!
Bob, my offer is still generous considering the inflation. Let's close the deal and avoid further losses for both of us.
Inflation is taking its toll on your share, Alice. I think it's time for me to take the bigger slice of the pie.
Bob, I'm trying to be reasonable, but this is getting ridiculous.  Accept this offer before inflation eats away at my share even further.
